item.description:
Would love to see a meetup focused on learning/hearing about the basics in social media that would make you more marketable in your career. (Is it critical to have Twitter? Facebook (despite that some employers look poorly on FB pages), Blog, Pinterest... Things like that. If he/she could share some basics about these platforms and how to get started too that would also be helpful.

I am not an expert - but would be open to attending event with those familiar with these executions.

group.name: The Boston Area Internet Marketing and Advertising Group

item.name: Social Media - Making Yourself More Marketable
